Text: I lost 700+ gigs of movies I downloaded from axxo fxg fxm etc... Now I will just rebuild it with BluRay rips so you the new go to guy

All I have to say about The Informers is... this could've been, and was so close to being, such a great film. Great Bret Easton Ellis novel, great acting, but the director's final cut is one of the worst I've ever seen. (Bring on Ellis' Executive Producer's cut! :P )
D/l now so can't comment on A/V but ur stuff is always good.  thx

Guys... I don't contest your choice of compression/quality/file-size trade-off (i.e. high/average/low, in that order). You've got that market segment nailed, and all power to you.
The deal breaker here is that this movie has been so completely panned by the critics.
I love Kim Basinger, so I'll grab it and split out the bits with her in them.
Thanks.
